alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Green Lake, northwestern Fond du Lac, northern Columbia and Marquette Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Waupaca to near Plainfield to near New Lisbon. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portage, Ripon, Berlin, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, Pardeeville, Montello, Markesan, Westfield, Princeton, Rosendale, Green Lake, Brandon, Lawrence, Eldorado, Packwaukee, Alto, Manchester, Mecan and Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette
